paragraph: Here you'll find links to my Ebay / reselling account where you can view my products for sale

intro: Selling a range of hype sneakers.
sellingPara: From Nike Dunks to Yeezy's and Off White, I sell all I can get my hands on so check out my ebay to see the selection!

intro: We currently stock nike products such as dunks ands jordans.
productPara: New Products are added when ever bought and updated and monitored according to market price!

intro: We take pride in the way we price.
pricingPara: We price our products depending on the market on how it fluctuates with condition and size taken into account.

intro: Currently only trading across one platform.
platformPara: We only, at this time, sell on our Ebay platform however, we're open to expanding to new platforms in the future so keep an eye open...

intro: Fast delivery times shipping from UK!
shippingPara: We're proud to tell you we can guarantee 1-2 days dispatch time!

intro: With 100% positive feedback, we strive to bring the best customer support!
customerPara: With over 35+ reviews on our services, we ensure to bring the best of the best to our customers!
